messages.content: Only the Lib Dems have a record of beating Labour here

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Josh Mason supports keeping the nuclear deterrent, while Labour and Jeremy Corbyn oppose it.
Josh Mason prioritizes keeping Teesside's link with the UK's biggest trading partner.
Josh Mason emphasizes the importance of succeeding at school and college.
Josh Mason supports helping people in need.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Libraries, street lights, and green spaces
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Josh Mason opposes Labour council's cuts and supports keeping libraries open and green spaces protected.
Josh Mason supports keeping the monarchy.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Conservatives a distant fourth here; Ukip and Conservatives out of the race.

issues.brexitEurope: Keeping Teesside's link with the biggest trading partner is a priority.
issues.defence: Supports keeping the nuclear deterrent, while Labour and Jeremy Corbyn oppose it.
issues.education: Wants children to succeed at school and college; admits local student achievement is 'unacceptably low'.
issues.socialWelfare: Supports helping people in need; criticizes Labour for not voting against cuts to vulnerable people.

community.content: Supports keeping libraries open, lights on, and green spaces protected; opposes Labour's cuts.

examples: Labour 1st, Lib Dem 2nd, Ukip 3rd, Con 4th in the last election.
Libraries, street lights, and green spaces: Josh Mason has been fighting Labour Council’s cuts for years.
Education: Josh Mason says, “Education is a top priority to give opportunity to everyone and make sure our area has the skills for the future.”
Only the Lib Dems have a record of beating Labour here.
Jeremy Corbyn's Labour admits local student achievement is 'unacceptably low'.
Jeremy Corbyn's Labour candidate couldn’t be bothered to vote against Conservative cuts to vulnerable people.
Labour and Jeremy Corbyn say, 'NO' to keeping nuclear deterrent.
Labour can’t make up their minds and follow Mrs May on Brexit.
Jeremy Corbyn's Labour cuts library openings, threatens to switch off street lights, and builds everywhere.
